comments.text:
This was a suggestion of bz's after I brought up the painting behaviour in compiz in bug #646937.

It would be nice if mozRequestAnimationFrame and painting in general was clamped way down if firefox was not visible.  Obscured isn't reasonable for metacity with compositing, or compiz, but minimised Firefox or Firefox on another desktop should not burn much CPU doing rendering.
